reviews.title: Great experience in our re-mortgage application
reviews.text: Our experience with Kay Stockdale was impeccable from start to finish. She kept in touch with us on a regular basis and nothing was too much trouble. She was also very understanding. I would highly recommend her to anyone looking to take out a mortgage with Bucks Building Society.

reviews.title: Applying for a RIO mortgage
reviews.text: I found the whole experience of applying for a RIO mortgage online easy. This was facilitated by Kay who always responded quickly to any emails and was a pleasure to talk to on the phone. As this building society is one of the few offering this type of mortgage I had never dealt with them before but I can certainly recommend them if you are considering applying.

I would definitely recommend if you are looking for a personal approach to getting a mortgage ! 10/10 service

All my questions have been responded to very prompty and thoroughly and I am very impressed with the level of service provided by Buckinghamshire Building Society.

reviews.title: Re-mortgage experience

reviews.title: As a broker I had not used Buckinghamshire previousl...
reviews.text: As a broker I had not used Buckinghamshire previously but have to say the openens and ease of communication has been fantastic on what was not the most straight forward of cases which has now received an offer of mortgage so all good

reviews.title: Shockingly slow, beyond comprehension
reviews.text: Effectively left on street when moving as they need more than 6 hours to complete a simple completion statement, thus preventing the chain from doing anything all day to complete.

reviews.title: Mortgage Application
reviews.text: I find their criteria to be flexible and even on a standalone Further Advance offered the cheaper existing client rate rather than the higher current rate available.

reviews.title: Complex Case Offered!
reviews.text: I have just had a very complex case offered by Buckinghamshire. I hadn't used them up to this point as a broker but due to a few bits of criteria I found that Buckinghamshire would lend subject to application. I initially spoke to Natalie about the case who was very helpful and then this moved onto Paige who was equally as helpful, both getting back to me very quickly when I had initial questions. The case was then underwritten by Stacey who carried on the excellent service as given by Natalie and Paige. May have been 5 stars but did take slightly longer than I anticipated to be approved with lots of information and documents needed which I understand and appreciate with complex cases however I think this was out of the hands of the individuals I have mentioned who I stress again were all great!

reviews.title: Submitted a complex case.
reviews.text: Submitted a complex case. The case was technically outside of policy, however Simon, Claire and Sam worked tirelessly on a solution and a positive outcome for the clients. It too longer than ideal to get to offer, however the flexibility and knowledge that they have shown has been imperative for my clients to get the right outcome.

reviews.title: Review of mortgage offer
reviews.text: When dealing with a mortgage offer and certain things happen, that are out of your hands. As an individual this can be very deflating. To be given time and their time to resolve the situation, to get a mortgage offer needed confirmed. I honestly couldn't be more thankful to Claire, Louise and Mark and the team at BBS for this. As they didn't have to, but they did.

reviews.title: Going The Extra Mile
reviews.text: On the day of the remortgage completion it suddenly became apparent that there would be a shortfall in funds. I contacted Claire and Susan at the Bucks and they immediately escalted my request for an amended offer, came through the following day, completion set for the day after. Amazing work by Claire and Susan and the teams behind them to get the completion done. Thank you and it was very much appreciated by me and my clients.

reviews.title: Bucks review
reviews.text: the BDM and staff are very knowledgeable and helpful

reviews.title: Bucking the trend.........
reviews.text: As a Mortgage Broker, I have been dealing with Bucks for some 15 years - They are my first call for the more difficult to place cases. They can't always help, but can be relied on to try their best to accommodate in a friendly & professional manner. As someone who spends their life dealing with similar institutions, I can tell you their attitude is quite refreshing!

reviews.title: AGM Member Review
reviews.text: Promotes confidence, very efficient. No known areas of improvement.

reviews.title: Helped my client remortgage when other lenders wouldn't...
reviews.text: My client had a few recent credit blips and two other lenders wouldn't consider her. After our D.I.P application, the lovely Paige at Buckinghamshire BS helped us find a way forward to help the client and get the application submitted. Buckinghamshire BS very much have a human approach to mortgages, rather than the usual tick box and computer says no attitude of the majority of lenders out there. Definitely try Bucks BS if you haven't already, or if you struggled with other lenders recently with a client and are about to give up. Thanks again Paige and speak again soon! Brian

reviews.title: Thank you Julie Hanlf
reviews.text: Julie was our regions business development manager and even though she covers another area now she is still on the end of the phone whenever I've needed help. She has helped me with complex cases and always with a smile. She is a great BDM and a great representative for Bucks.

reviews.title: Brokers choice for common sense lending
reviews.text: I have had the pleasure of working with BBS on a couple of occasions when , as broker, the case didn't fit standard criteria but made common sense lending. My BDM Paul Johnson took the time to meet with me and discuss the case over breakfast ( which he sprung for, thanks PJ!) and said he thought this was a case for them and to leave it with him. He came back in short order and said yep they will do it. It was a little tricky during underwriting but Louise Bellis who was underwriting the case liaised with us and together we worked the issues and next week we expect the offer out. Listen - this wasn't a standard case so don't moan if it takes a little longer than usual and explain to your clients why and (providing everyone keeps talking) things come out favorably for all but this isn't the first time I have used BBS and it wont be the last. Well played to PJ, Louise and all involved in making stuff happen at the BBS. Carry on . Malcolm Clarke, Simpson FS, Royal Leamington Spa, Feb 2023

reviews.title: Claire BDM is Fantasic
reviews.text: Huge thanks Claire. Not enough BDMs do the hard yards up front. Tricky case for clients with a small holding on the property and other quirks. Took the time to assess the application up front and you have delivered on what you promised. Huge thanks to yourself and the underwriters involved
